price: 118 Dis : « Veuille, Seigneur, m’accorder Ton pardon et Ta miséricorde qui dépasse toute miséricorde ! »
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ وَٱرۡحَمۡ وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi igh'fir wa-ir'ḥam wa-anta khayru al-rāḥimīna
